arcade.patch.env.grid

Class PatchGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.grid.PatchGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid

    public class PatchGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grid
    Implementation of Grid for patch models.

    PatchGrid uses the location hash to map to bags of agents.
